usage.cn: 如果你勇于对过去说“拜拜”，生活就会回赠给你一个新的“哈喽”。
usage.eng: If you're brave to say “good bye”, life will reward you with a new “hello”.

usage.cn: 只要你勇敢的说出再见，生活一定会赐予你一个新的开始
usage.eng: If you're brave enough to say GOODBYE,life will reward you with a new HELLO.

usage.cn: 勇敢的做自己，不要为任何人而改变。如果他们不能接受最差的你，也不配拥有最好的你。
usage.eng: Be yourself/Brave do yourself, don't change for anyone. If they don't like you at your worst, then they don't deserve you at your best.
